text: Clara Aller (born 11 April 1987) is an Spanish water polo player. She was a member of the Spain women's national water polo team. She was a part of the team at the 2006 Women's European Water Polo Championship, and 2009 World Aquatics Championships, == References == == Other websites == * Spanish Clara Aller (L) tries to score despite Brazilian Melina Teno Getty Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish water polo players
title: Clara Aller
